backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with all core types for services, orders, payments, user profiles, showcase samples, and migrations, applying Migration.run via with-clause.
backend/migration.mo: Contains migration logic converting old 4-slot sample structures into new 12-slot showcase arrays for all categories, transforming stored bannerSamples.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs tied to sample gallery and admin upload features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and contents of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and shared base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading the Tidio script.
frontend/public/deploy-marker.txt: Deployment marker documenting replacement of product banner fallback images and their source mappings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, providers, layout, and guarded pages for orders, products, payments, and authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/ExploreWor: Admin UI for uploading and updating showcase sample images per category with validation, previews, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductBan: File is empty or not provided.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Component that checks admin status and conditionally renders children or fallback content.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Route guard that redirects unauthenticated users to /login and shows a loading state while identity initializes.
frontend/src/components/BrandFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, contact details, and a dynamic attribution link.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Displays the site header with navigation, authentication actions, mobile menu handling, and scroll-to-services behavior.
frontend/src/components/BrandLayout.tsx: Defines the main page layout combining header, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/components/ExploreWorkSampl: Shows a grid of showcase sample slots for a category, with images or placeholders.
frontend/src/components/OtpDemoField.tsx: Implements a demo six‑digit OTP generator and verifier with input slots and validation feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProductAddToCart: Manages a two‑step flow for selecting a sample and submitting order details, including validation and cart submission.
frontend/src/components/ProductOrderForm: Provides form fields for brand name and description with live word count tracking.
frontend/src/components/ProductSampleSel: Displays selectable product sample images and highlights the chosen option.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Presents a simple service card with optional icon, pricing, delivery time, and action content.
frontend/src/constants/premiumServices.t: Defines fixed-priced premium service metadata and helpers to retrieve service display info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToCart.ts: Hook to add items to cart and fetch caller orders with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrderVerifica: Provides admin checks, payment verification, and queries for orders and notification requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Exposes authentication state derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useCancelOrder.ts: Mutation hook for canceling an order and refreshing caller orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useConfirmationEmailR: Mutation for submitting confirmation email requests and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useConfirmationMessag: Fetches the backend confirmation message template using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: Creates a Stripe checkout session via backend actor and returns session URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderPayment.ts: Mutation hook to update order payment status and refresh caller orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductBannerSampl: Fetches and updates product banner showcase samples and defines sample slot metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Fetches available backend services using the actor interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useShowcaseSamples.ts: Hooks fetch and update showcase samples per category and generate 12 display slots with sample image URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeConfiguratio: Hooks check whether Stripe is configured and allow updating the Stripe configuration with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeVerification: Provides mutations to verify payments, confirm orders, and fetch Stripe session status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Hooks submit support requests and fetch support request lists with safe handling for unauthorized access.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks fetch and save the caller’s user profile and basic profile, with query invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a gold‑and‑black theme, utility classes, and service card styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessCardPage.tsx: Page displays business card service details, ordering logic, and a gallery of business card showcases.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Simple contact page with styled email and WhatsApp links for inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard aggregates services, orders, support requests, admin tools, and form handling for order creation.
frontend/src/pages/HelpPage.tsx: Help and support page with a contact form, validation, and support request submission plus quick links to order cancellation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, product listings, premium service scrolling, and logic to start an order or redirect to login.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with redirect on successful authentication and basic error handling.
frontend/src/pages/LogoDesignPage.tsx: Product page for logo design showing details, banner, sample gallery, and order initiation that stores session parameters.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays user's orders with status icons, payment badges, cancellation logic, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Order confirmation page gated by payment completion, showing order details, next steps, and fallback access-denied state.
frontend/src/pages/OrderFormPage.tsx: Loads order details from session, validates user input, and submits an order to create a cart entry before navigating to payment.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancellation message and lets users retry payment or return to their orders.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentPage.tsx: Displays order details, checks Stripe configuration, and initiates a checkout session to start payment.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe payment status, confirms the order, and redirects to the order confirmation page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoFramePage.tsx: Shows the Photo Frame Design service details and allows authenticated users to start an order.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays all premium service pricing and available payment options.
frontend/src/pages/ProductBannerPage.tsx: Renders the Product Banner Design page with service details, preview image, and order handling based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of premium service cards and routes users to ordering or login based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity signup flow, profile creation, and validation before redirecting users.
frontend/src/pages/TrackOrderPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a specific order’s status, payment details, and navigation options for authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/stripeOrderMapping.ts: Converts an ExpandedOrder into an array of ShoppingItem objects with validated pricing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Implements word-count and email validation utilities with limits and error messaging.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state for restoring 12-sample galleries per category with admin-only upload controls, notes missing samples, and lists existing and new feature requests. Includes schema versioning, known issues, and requirements for backend and migration support.
